Invocation Name: refrigerator story
des:
Listen to this story with a timeless lesson.
Maggie discovers that she is really the student of a different kind of science, a science of simpler, non consumerist, minimalism and energy ergonomics. Are you such a green thinker?, ready to innovate an alternative lifestyle, then break away from the mainstream and watch , as your life is more meaningful and filled with value. 
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
